Package org.coronabounce.models

Class CoquilleBille

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coronabounce.models.CoquilleBille
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfinedBille
    public class CoquilleBille
extends Object
    Class which represents moving capacities of person/individual.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private boolean canRebound
      Variable indicated if point is movable then ricochet (false only for immovable points during Strict Lockdown).
      private Controllable controller
      Current controller contains all parameters.
      private Position currentPosition
      Current position of the Shell.
      private int id
      Shell identifier (in order to redefine equals).
      private static int idCpt
      The number of Shell already created.
      private Individual individual
      Individual that the Shell will contain.
      private static int MAX_SPEED
      Upper bound to set speed points.
      private double movingSpeedX
      A moving speed in x to move faster or slower.
      private double movingSpeedY
      A moving speed in y to move faster or slower.
      private Population population
      Current population where Shell reside.
      private Random r
      Random number to set speed points.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CoquilleBille​(double speedX, double speedY, Individual individual, Population pop)
      Internal use constructor. Instantiates a new Coquille bille.
      CoquilleBille​(Individual individual, Population pop)
      External use constructor. Instantiates Coquille bille by Individual and set him a random speed.

      • isNear

        private boolean isNear​(CoquilleBille coc)
        Measure distance between current point and point passing as parameter.
        Parameters:
        coc - coquilleBille to measure distance with.
        Returns:
        true if distance less than or equal to two radius of points (so they are contiguous).
